How many people are affected by small fiber neuropathy ?,The prevalence of small fiber neuropathy is unknown.,GHR,small fiber neuropathy
What are the genetic changes related to small fiber neuropathy ?,"Mutations in the SCN9A or SCN10A gene can cause small fiber neuropathy. These genes provide instructions for making pieces (the alpha subunits) of sodium channels. The SCN9A gene instructs the production of the alpha subunit for
